review: I LOVE MY FIRE TV STICK. IT WAS EASY TO INSTALL. HIGHLY RECOMMEND IT. SO NICE TO WATCH MOVIES ON MY TVINSTEAD OF MY COMPUTER SCREEN. ALSO THE SCREEN SAVER HAS SUCH BEAUTIFUL SCENES ITS A BONUS.
author: S Barley

review: Disappointing to know that you have to purchase either Prime or individual shows
author: valerie

review: This Fire stick is great!  We are very happy.  We highly recommend this to anyone!
author: Stacy Biswurm

review: Streams music and video as expected.  A nice selection of content providers.  A nice alternative to buying "smart TVs or BluRay players".
author: N Timmer

review: It does not stay connected bought as a gift now I am stuck with it... SMH
author: John C.

review: still trying to get acquainted with product.. wish their was a better guide.
author: sheldon stone

review: Got this for our son. Works great and easily set up. He loves his minecraft videos and netflix. Ordering another for my room.
author: Gina Rodgers

review: Very easy to set up and get going and the movies and television series on available on Amazon Prime is great.  Everything is very simple to operate.
author: Doug L
